title: Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, opens up about her family
author: CBS This Morning
description:
For the first time Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, publicly discusses her father Thomas Markle and her half-sister's forthcoming tell-all book in this previously unaired clip from her and Prince Harry's sit-down with Oprah Winfrey.

---
Each weekday morning, "CBS This Morning" co-hosts Gayle King, Anthony Mason and Tony Dokoupil deliver two hours of original reporting, breaking news and top-level newsmaker interviews in an engaging and informative format that challenges the norm in network morning news programs. The broadcast has earned a prestigious Peabody Award, a Polk Award, four News & Documentary Emmys, three Daytime Emmys and the 2017 Edward R. Murrow Award for Best Newscast. The broadcast was also honored with an Alfred I. duPont-Columbia Award as part of CBS News division-wide coverage of the shootings at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Connecticut. Check local listings for "CBS This Morning" broadcast times.

每个工作日早上，"CBS今晨 "的联合主持人Gayle King，Anthony Mason和Tony Dokoupil都会以引人入胜和内容丰富的形式提供两个小时的原创报道，突发新闻和顶级新闻制作人采访，挑战网络早间新闻节目的常规。该广播节目获得了著名的皮博迪奖、波克奖、四项新闻与纪录片艾美奖、三项日间艾美奖和2017年爱德华-R-默罗最佳新闻广播奖。作为康涅狄格州纽敦桑迪胡克小学枪击事件的CBS新闻全部门报道的一部分，该广播还获得了阿尔弗雷德-I-杜邦-哥伦比亚奖。请查看当地列表，了解 "CBS今晨 "的播出时间。

每個工作日早上，"CBS今晨 "的聯合主持人Gayle King，Anthony Mason和Tony Dokoupil都會以引人入勝和內容豐富的形式提供兩個小時的原創報道，突發新聞和頂級新聞製作人採訪，挑戰網絡早間新聞節目的常規。該廣播節目獲得了著名的皮博迪獎、波克獎、四項新聞與紀錄片艾美獎、三項日間艾美獎和2017年愛德華-R-默羅最佳新聞廣播獎。作爲康涅狄格州紐敦桑迪胡克小學槍擊事件的CBS新聞全部門報道的一部分，該廣播還獲得了阿爾弗雷德-I-杜邦-哥倫比亞獎。請查看當地列表，瞭解 "CBS今晨 "的播出時間。
